spec_data.Name: php-horde-Horde-Kolab-Storage
spec_data.Description:
Storing user data in an IMAP account belonging to the user is one of the
Kolab server core concepts. This package provides all the necessary means
to deal with this type of data storage effectively.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 07:57:43 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A package for handling Kolab data stored on an IMAP server
